# VEHICLE::SET_DISABLE_HELI_EXPLODE_FROM_BODY_DAMAGE

## Summary
Prevents a helicopter from exploding when taking fairly minor body damage

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** disableExplode
